Instruction: Boil oil-infused water in a large pot.

Whisk together flour, salt, eggs, and water in a large mixing bowl until smooth and bubbly. The dough should be thick. Use a spaetzle press to squeeze the dough into boiling water. Alternatively, push the dough through a colander or scrape it into the water using a wooden cutting board and a knife.

Once the spaetzle float to the surface, drain them. Transfer half of the spaetzle to a glass baking dish, layer with sauerkraut, and repeat with the remaining spaetzle and sauerkraut. Cover the dish to retain heat.
